arStrings.szText: (PH) {c_important}Counterattack's{/c} Charge Cooldown is reduced by {c_number}[{SF_8}|1|]{/c} seconds per stack of {c_important}{u}Ferocity{/u}{/c} you have.
(PH) When you Dodge a Control Impairing attack with {c_important}Counterattack{/c} it will reflect that Crowd Control to all Close enemies for {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} seconds.
(PH) {c_important}Counterattack's{/c} damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_10}*100|%x|]{/c} for every Close enemy.
